item.title: My First Guitar
item.description: I admit I have become lazy. I have not written about myself for a long time. And I apologize for polluting this space with movie and book thoughts. A lot of things have been happening (or should I say, the lack thereof?). But surely, the coolest things to happen is my guitar. Yes, ladies and gentlemen! My first guitar. At this point, I am not clear whether the pandemic screwed me or I screwed myself.
